name: urn
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
a container, especially a large, round one on a stem, that is used for decorative purposes in a garden, or one that has a lid and is used for holding a dead person's ashes (= the powder that is left after a dead body has been burned)
Craig Roberts/Photolibrary/GettyImages
a large, cylinder-shaped metal container with a lid, used for holding a large amount of a drink such as tea or coffee and keeping it hot: a tea urn
Anthony-Masterson/Photodisc/GettyImages

Add to word list
Add to word list
a large, round container from which coffee or tea is served, or a decorative container, esp. one that holds the ashes of the body of a dead person after it has been cremated (= burned)
